Posts.Content: Excellent  thanks so much for all these suggestions!! I’m on it now!! love vicki xx
Posts.Title: Help for choosing gifts for friend having chemo.

Posts.Content: ive been told this is a good place to ask for some advice: i have a friend whose having chemo for breast cancer and I want to send her some goodies in the post, any ideas welcome especially for skin care that you’d recommend?  Many thanks vicki xxxx
Posts.Title: Help for choosing gifts for friend having chemo.

Posts.Content: Dear Karen  many thanks for this, so much more helpful than me going into Superdrug and guessing at what will be a good present.   So glad to hear you are now cancer free.  Hope you’re loving each day! Life is precious.  Thanks for taking the time to write  love vicki
Posts.Title: Help for choosing gifts for friend having chemo.

Posts.Content: This is brilliant  thanks so much! vicki xx
